scripts.build:linux-x64: bun build ./src/index.tsx --outdir=dist --target=node --sourcemap --define "process.env.NODE_ENV='development'" && bun build --compile dist/index.js --minify --sourcemap --target=bun-linux-x64 --outfile dist/osu-pps-downloader_linux-x64
scripts.build:linux-arm64: bun build ./src/index.tsx --outdir=dist --target=node --sourcemap --define "process.env.NODE_ENV='development'" && bun build --compile dist/index.js --minify --sourcemap --target=bun-linux-arm64 --outfile dist/osu-pps-downloader_linux-arm64
scripts.build:windows-x64: bun build ./src/index.tsx --outdir=dist --target=node --sourcemap --define "process.env.NODE_ENV='development'" && bun build --compile dist/index.js --windows-icon=./src/icon.ico --windows-title="osu!pps downloader"  --windows-description="osu!pps downloader" --windows-publisher="Sayrix" --minify --sourcemap --target=bun-windows-x64 --outfile dist/osu-pps-downloader_windows-x64.exe
scripts.build:darwin-arm64: bun build ./src/index.tsx --outdir=dist --target=node --sourcemap --define "process.env.NODE_ENV='development'" && bun build --compile dist/index.js --minify --sourcemap --target=bun-darwin-arm64 --outfile dist/osu-pps-downloader_darwin-arm64
scripts.build: bun run build:windows-x64 && bun run build:linux-x64 && bun run build:linux-arm64 && bun run build:darwin-arm64
